verse.name: v1
v2
v3
verse.lines: Take time to be holy, Let Him be thy guide, And run not before Him, Whatever betide; In joy or in sorrow, Still follow thy Lord, And, looking to Jesus, Still trust in His Word.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Take time to be holy, Be calm in thy soul; Each tho't and each motive Beneath His control; Thus led by His Spirit To fountains of love, Thou soon shalt be fitted For service above.
